ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState if widget.ProviderWidget <> None and (widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.State == EntityState.Initialized): widget.Hidden = True return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContrato
podeAlterar = CNContrato.PodeAlterarFilialFormulario(widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.Handle)
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterar
